price: ߊ߬ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߵߊ߬ ߛߎߥߊ߲ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߞߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߖߘߍ߬ߟߊ߬ߛߊߦߌ ߡߌ߬ߘߴߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ ߞߊ߲ߘߊ߫
arabic: ثُمَّ ٱجۡتَبَٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ فَتَابَ عَلَيۡهِ وَهَدَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: thumma ij'tabāhu rabbuhu fatāba ʿalayhi wahadā
